title: Business Analyst
description:
##

### Roles & Responsibilities:


Participate in requirements gathering meetings
Collaborate with clients to understand their business processes
Performing requirements analysis and create user stories
Serving as a liaison between Business users, and development team
Conduct requirement grooming meetings
Conduct retrospective meetings & Demos
Provide training and support to end-users
Willingness to assist the cross-functional team throughout project development
Research, gather and synthesize information to support the development of business solutions ### Prerequisite:
Ability to identify and document use cases
Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills
Basic UX and database skills
Familiarity with Estimation models
Familiarity in Software Lifecycle and Scrum management process
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills ### Nice to have:
Worked on product development & Logistic/Travel domain
Ability to create UX screens
Experience with data analysis and modeling tools **Experience:** 3-6 Years **Location:** Gurugram Kindly share your resume at [recruitment@mtap.in](mailto:recruitment@mtap.in)
